Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.listener

Interface ThemeListener<T extends DynamicAppTheme>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ThemeListener.Export<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRemoteThemeFragment, DynamicThemeFragment, ThemeFragment
    public interface ThemeListener<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
    Interface to listen various theme events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ThemeListener.Code
      Interface to listen the theme code events.
      static interface  ThemeListener.Export<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
      Interface to listen the theme export events.
      static interface  ThemeListener.Import<T extends DynamicAppTheme>
      Interface to listen the theme import events.
      static interface  ThemeListener.Select
      Interface to listen the theme selection events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ThemePreview<T> getThemePreview()
      Get the theme preview associated with this listener.
      void onLoadTheme​(T theme)
      This method will called to load settings from the supplied theme.
      void onSetAction​(int themeAction, ThemePreview<T> themePreview, boolean enable)
      This method will be called on setting the action icon.
      void onThemeError​(int themeAction, ThemePreview<T> themePreview, java.lang.Exception e)
      This method will be called on error while doing theme operations.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoadTheme

        void onLoadTheme​(@NonNull
                 T theme)
        This method will called to load settings from the supplied theme.
        Parameters:
        theme - The dynamic app theme to be loaded.

      • getThemePreview

        @Nullable
ThemePreview<T> getThemePreview()
        Get the theme preview associated with this listener.
        Returns:
        The theme preview associated with this listener.

      • onSetAction

        void onSetAction​(int themeAction,
                 @Nullable
                 ThemePreview<T> themePreview,
                 boolean enable)
        This method will be called on setting the action icon.

        It can be used to change the action icon while sharing the theme.

        Parameters:
        themeAction - The theme action to be used.
        themePreview - The theme preview to set the share action.
        enable - true to enable the share action.

      • onThemeError

        void onThemeError​(int themeAction,
                  @Nullable
                  ThemePreview<T> themePreview,
                  @Nullable
                  java.lang.Exception e)
        This method will be called on error while doing theme operations.
        Parameters:
        themeAction - The theme action to be used.
        themePreview - The theme preview to set the share action.
        e - The optional exception.
